downloadTitle: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager 2016 inbox MP hotfix for WMI health monitor issue
downloadDescription: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager 2016 inbox MP hotfix for WMI health monitor issue

downloadFile.name: Microsoft System Center 2016 Core Monitoring Inbox MP.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/8/8/a/88aa913d-a984-4921-b1db-ed84257dbbcf/Microsoft System Center 2016 Core Monitoring Inbox MP.msi

detailsSection:
The WMI health monitor was not working when
  • 1. WINRM was configured to use https only
  • 2. The Service Principal Name was registered to set http/servername to a user account

The issue has been fixed, the protocol used by the script that was causing the failure has been modified to use the DCOM protocol as in SCOM 2012 R2. Installation - Import the .msi package on to the SCOM 2016 machine and install the files. If the MPs already exists, they will be upgraded with the latest files.
The package has 2 inbox MPs, their names and versions are given below
  • Microsoft.SystemCenter.2007.mp - 7.2.11907.0
  • Microsoft.SystemCenter.Internal.mp 7.0.8437.10
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft System Center 2016 Core Monitoring Inbox MP.msi
installInstructionSection: Import and install the msi package on to the SCOM 2016 machine
